title: Low Stock Alerts Configuration
content:
# Low Stock Alerts Configuration

## Overview
Automated alerts when inventory falls below threshold.

## Configuration

### Per-Product Thresholds
Set individual thresholds based on:
- Average daily sales
- Lead time for reorder
- Safety stock buffer

### Alert Recipients
- Inventory Manager (all alerts)
- Category Managers (category-specific)
- Warehouse Manager (location-specific)

### Alert Channels
1. Email (immediate)
2. Slack (real-time)
3. Dashboard notification
4. SMS (critical items only)

## Alert Rules

### Priority Levels
**Critical** (< 10 units):
- Immediate email + SMS
- Automatic reorder trigger
- Daily status updates

**Warning** (< 30 units):
- Email notification
- Dashboard alert
- Review for reorder

**Info** (< 50 units):
- Dashboard notification only

## Reorder Logic
```
reorder_point = (avg_daily_sales * lead_time_days) + safety_stock
reorder_quantity = economic_order_quantity (EOQ)
```

## Automated Reordering
- Enabled for high-velocity items
- Requires supplier integration
- Purchase orders generated automatically
- Approval workflow for large orders

## Reporting
- Daily low-stock report
- Weekly reorder summary
- Monthly trend analysis

## Adjusting Thresholds
Navigate to: Inventory > Settings > Alert Thresholds
1. Select product or category
2. Set threshold quantity
3. Choose alert recipients
4. Save configuration
